definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, most notably associated with Cosmo Kramer, a fictional character from the American television sitcom Seinfeld.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作姓氏，最著名的是指美国情景喜剧《宋飞正传》中的虚构角色科斯莫·克雷默。
definitions.example_en: Kramer’s eccentric behavior always brought unexpected chaos to Jerry’s apartment.
definitions.example_cn: 克雷默古怪的行为总给杰瑞的公寓带来意想不到的混乱。
